body:
Hello,






I have a problem with su2rad. I am using SketchUp Make 2015 and
su2rad_daysim_r03. Unfortunately, the export doesn't work, neither by
colour/layer nor by "daysim". 


Exports by colour and by layer generate the .rif file and a few directories,
but as I try to import it into daysim, the following error message appears:


"Cannot find files:


.\radiance\medium


.\radiance\ambfiles\untitled1.amb


.\1)"


Export by "daysim" doesn't work at all. The following error message appears:


"Error reading file: prefs.dat"






Moreover, the material assignment doesn't work as well. It's impossible to
drop the radiance materials over the SketchUp elements.






Can anybody help me? I would really appreciate it.






Weidenmeise
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2016-April/011698.html).</sup>
